mapper.update: UPDATE b_otaorder odr INNER JOIN ( SELECT bo.id FROM b_pmsroomorder bp, b_otaorder bo, b_otaroomorder bor WHERE bp.checkintime >= #{checkInBeginTime} AND bp.checkintime < #{checkInEndTime} AND bo.id = bor.otaorderid AND bor.hotelid = bp.hotelid AND bor.pmsroomorderno = bp.pmsroomorderno AND bo.orderstatus IN (180) and bo.spreadUser = -1 AND bp.checkintime < date_sub(now(),INTERVAL 30 MINUTE) ) bo ON odr.id = bo.id SET odr.InvalidReason = #{invalidReason}

UPDATE b_otaorder odr INNER JOIN ( SELECT bo.id FROM b_pmsroomorder bp, b_otaorder bo, b_otaroomorder bor WHERE bp.checkintime >= #{checkInBeginTime} AND bp.checkintime < #{checkInEndTime} AND bo.id = bor.otaorderid AND bor.hotelid = bp.hotelid AND bor.pmsroomorderno = bp.pmsroomorderno AND bo.orderstatus IN (190, 200) and bo.spreadUser = -1 AND bp.checkintime < date_sub(bp.checkouttime,INTERVAL 30 MINUTE) ) bo ON odr.id = bo.id SET odr.InvalidReason = #{invalidReason}
